pages.text: Roaming the shadows around the islands of the $(thing)Aether$(), $(thing)Moa$() are large passive birds. Unlike their cousins, the $(thing)Cockatrice$(), there is nothing to fear from $(thing)Moa$(). If you're lucky enough to obtain a $(item)Moa Egg$(), you can hatch it in an $(item)Incubator$() to raise and saddle your own tame $(thing)Moa$() to ride. Baby $(thing)Moa$() growth can be accelerated with $(item)Aechor Petals$().$(br)Killing a $(thing)Moa$() grants 1 $(thing)Cutting$() experience.

pages.name: Moa
pages.drop1: minecraft:feather{display: {Lore: ["Drops: 2-3", "Affected by Looting", "Affected by Cutting Skill"]}}

pages.title: Moa Colours
pages.text: $(thing)Moa$() can have a variety of colours to their plumage, and each colour reflects the abilities of them when tame. The most common is the $(thing)Blue Moa$(), which can jump 3 times in mid-air. Also quite common, the $(thing)Orange Moa$() can only jump twice in mid-air, but can run faster than other variants. $(thing)White Moa$() can jump 4 times in mid-air, as can $(thing)Brown Moa$(), though brown ones can jump much higher. The rarest is the $(thing)Black Moa$(), which can jump 8 times in mid-air.
